title: League Cannot Launch (Bugsplat)
body: Whenever I try to open my League client, it flashes the League icon for a quick second and then bugsplat non-stop pops up multiple times and keeps stacking. I have to use task manager to end the bugsplat so that it stops producing bugsplat windows every second. The launcher also never opens. This occurred right after the 7.6 patch. I queued up for 1 game and then it bugsplatted and never was able to launch league ever since then.

replies.body:
It sounds like you might have a bad install so it's failing to render anything.  You can use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a repatch to get that cleared up.  If you still run into any issues, launch it on the legacy client and let me know if you get any other error messages.

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

Let me know if this helps!
